text: Paul Winner (1934–2019) was an artist, Liberal activist, magistrate and public relations manager. His works included the textbook, Effective PR Management, and a caricature of Pope John Paul II. ==References== ==External links== * Paul Winner art Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Alumni of St John's College, Oxford Category:British artists Category:Liberal Party (UK) parliamentary candidates Category:Magistrates Category:People from Hampstead Category:British public relations people
title: Paul Winner
